job.title: AI Chatbot Trainer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description: NLU Grammar or AI / Chatbot Trainer 12 month contract Remote M-F 40 hr work week 1 Do you have experience working with data? Does conversational interfaces or voice experiences excite you? Are you interested in growing conversational experiences at a Fortune 100? We are looking for an AI Trainer or Data Scientist to join the conversational platform team. Our ideal candidate is a strong in understanding grammar and data related to conversational interfaces. This is an exciting opportunity on a new and growing team. EEO Employer  Apex Systems is an equal opportunity employer.
